import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { deleteNews } from '../redux/Action' const Home = () => { const newsdata = useSelector(state => state.newsdata.newsdata) const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
HOME PAGE {newsdata.map((data, id) => { console.log(id) return ( ) })}
Title Description Created_date Publisher Category
{data.title} {data.description} {data.created_date} {data.publisher} {data.category}
) } export default Home
